book.title: Flowers of the Sky
book.description: 简介： What soul was his, when, from the naked topOf some bold headland, he beheld the sunRise up and bathe the world in light! He lookedOcean and earth, the solid frame of earthAnd ocean's liquid mass, beneath him layIn gladness and deep joy....
